camera_and_perspective.view_angle: High-angle Drone Shot, 45Â° Bird's Eye View, Wide Establishing Shot
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 24mm Wide-angle lens, Rectilinear projection, High clarity, Sharp focus on foreground building complex
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus but with strong Atmospheric Perspective (Haze) fading the background into grey

lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Strong Diffuse Skylight, Even Global Illumination (GI), No harsh directional shadows, 'Shadowless' aesthetic
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Overcast sky, Grey/White clouds, Thin Atmospheric Haze/Mist in the distance
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Diffuse shading under trees and eaves, No distinct cast shadows

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: None active (Daylight dominant), Windows appearing dark/neutral reflecting the environment
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Natural material response under soft light, Even illumination revealing geometric details

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural flat daylight, Asphalt roads showing subtle sheen
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Vibrant Lush Greens under diffuse light, Soft top-lighting on dense tree canopies, No specular highlights on leaves

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Naturalistic & Desaturated, Lush Forest Green vs White Foggy Background
color_and_grading.temperature: Neutral Daylight (5500K) with a slight Cool bias in the shadows/background
color_and_grading.post_processing: High-Key Exposure, High Contrast, De-haze reduced (to maintain misty look), Clean and fresh tone

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: D5 Render (Real-time Raytracing style), Corona Renderer (Overcast setup), Unreal Engine 5
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Hyper-realistic vegetation assets, Volumetric fog

environment_textures.foliage_style: Manicured urban landscaping, Young trees with sparse canopies, vibrant green grass
